projects.title: Integrity AI
projects.description: Welcome to IntegrityAI where you can find trusted partners in the passive crypto space. We are people of integrity that have experienced the ‚Äúrug pulls‚Äù in this space and wanted to come up with something ourselves in order to provide a REAL revenue source for you to be able to plug into. Many of you KNOW the people behind this project, but we can‚Äôt tell you, in order that we can maintain our anonymity to provide you with this very great opportunity. Every trading platform has risk. So, we do not intend to promise you that this is without that. But we promise to do everything we can to offset that risk with the best risk management we can muster. After all, with legit trading, we don‚Äôt win if you lose! We look forward to standing the test of time and going beyond that 6‚Äì9-month death sentence that seems to be getting shorter with all these opportunists coming on the scene. We are doing real trading. We hope that those who choose to be ‚Äúrisk takers‚Äù and take us at face value will do so to get started, and those who are the more cautious ones will take all the time they need to ‚Äúwatch and see‚Äù as their friends stay winning with IntegrityAI.

tools.title: Pool Match Me

tools.toolVideoText:
Smart Desktop AI is a powerful email marketing AI that will automatically generate you leads from a pool of 50 Million business owners and qualified buyers.  Generate leads and get paid for referring others who purchase using your link!

Cost:
FREE!  - Smart Desktop AI is now FREE to sign up as of July 29, 2024.

Earn Referral Commissions:
There is an amazing opportunity to earn with Smart Desktop AI's commission program!
  • Earn  $60  for each person you refer to Smart Desktop AI and they sign up for FREE!
  • + earn $15/month recurring on your referrals!
  • + earn $15 for anyone that your direct referrals refer!
‚Äã
Investors are paying you to sign people up instead of using the money for paid advertising. The affiliate network is the paid advertising. This is massive.

ANNOUNCEMENT - JULY 29, 2024
Smart Desktop AI is Now FREE!
The decision has been made to take the enrollment for new Affiliates to FREE. Officially as of today, new Affiliates will no longer be charged $20 to become an Affiliate and have the Smart Desktop AI. Following many successful models in the past to expedite the growth of a large user base, the decision was made to follow this strategy. As future "Fee Based" AI services are rolled out, this will provide for much more rapid user adoption and revenue growth for the company.
(The Affiliate Compensation Stays the Same)

Announcement - July 8, 2024
Cost change from $187/Monthly to just $20 one time!

Smart Desktop AI raised one million last week in seed money. 
Why should you care? Because that money, instead of going to pay for employees and paid advertising, it's going to you to sign up as many people as you can into Smart Desktop AI.

Watch the video between Ace and Corey below to hear about a MAJOR PRICE UPDATE and how you can make a killing by signing up other people!
